text: @realDonaldTrump Weirdo really thinks he created 2.5 Million jobs when it was Democratic States hit hardest by COVID-19 that started easing restrictions & opening the everything back up smh. Takes no responsibility for the U.S having 2 Million Covid-19 cases. China 🇨🇳 stopped it at about 84,000‼️
